clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Small pneumothorax on the left lower lobe side.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 9 mm in diameter.
Enlarged lymph nodes in left lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Focal consolidation in left lower lobe with air bronchogram.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left lower lobe.
Pleural effusion on the left lower lobe side, moderate in size.
